title: Child killer Susan Smith's prison mischief & Florida police say they caught a 'killer clown'
itunes:title: Child killer Susan Smith's prison mischief & Florida police say they caught a 'killer clown'
description:
Susan Smith has been misbehaving in a South Carolina prison, where she is serving a life sentence for murdering of her 2 young sons, according to People magazine's Steve Helling. Helling joins Nancy Grace,reporter Mary Ellen Hopkins, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan, and co-host Alan Duke to discuss how Smith's causing trouble behind bar. Grace also puts out the alert for missing LSU student Michael Nickelotte Jr., who vanished from his campus apartment on September 18. Florida investigators believe they have solved the mystery of who dressed up as a clown to shoot Marlene Warren 27 years ago.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
